attributes.action: come out and explain why small companys are being fleeced by more tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
why are small companys being forced to pay more punative tax demands when the larger corporations either go off shore to hide there assets and maximise there profits often paying no uk taxes at all !!

isnt it time he and his robber barons turned there guns on these profits and taxed them at source 

not the small co who are just trying to survive and earn a living for the people they employ !

or why do they not just come right out with it ban all small co and get us working for the govt so they can control us as they wish

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
